channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nearly 70 people rescued from New York ski mountain gondolas after malfunction
item.description: Nearly 70 people had to be rescued from gondola cabins at an upstate New York ski area after a mechanical problem forced a shutdown

item.title: Tennessee appeals court says school shooter's writings can be made public
item.description: A Tennessee appeals court has ruled that the writings of a shooter who killed six people at the Covenant School in Nashville can be made available to ...

item.title: New York's incoming archbishop will focus on evangelizing and reengagement
item.description: The incoming archbishop of New York says he plans to emphasize the importance of evangelizing as he takes charge of one of the biggest U.S. archdioces...

item.title: Argentina and US sign free trade deal in breakthrough for Milei
item.description: Argentina and the United States have reached an expansive trade deal, a win for Argentine President Javier Milei as he moves to open up the South Amer...

item.title: The detention of NJ kebab shop owners sparked change. Deportation still looms
item.description: The detention of a Turkish couple who own a New Jersey kebab shop helped galvanize their community against immigration crackdowns last year
